body_html:
This is looking nice! I have a remark though:
for it to be merged in master, it will need a VPU implementation. It can be naive, but preferably better than converting the sparse tensors to dense tensors
Do you have an idea of whar we could do for the CPU side?

body:
This is looking nice! I have a remark though:
for it to be merged in master, it will need a VPU implementation. It can be naive, but preferably better than converting the sparse tensors to dense tensors
Do you have an idea of whar we could do for the CPU side?
